meanings.definition: An instrument used for examining internal parts of the body or inspecting inaccessible objects.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a fiberscope to look inside the patient's stomach.
meanings.sent2: The fiberscope helped the mechanic inspect the engine without taking it apart.
meanings.sent3: The fiberscope decided to explore the mysterious cave inside the body.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was a fiberscope, revealing hidden truths about the world.
meanings.sent5: With the fiberscope, the mysteries of the body became clear as day.

meanings.definition: A flexible optical instrument consisting of a bundle of optical fibers.
meanings.sent1: The fiberscope's flexibility allowed it to navigate tight spaces easily.
meanings.sent2: The fiberscope's design made it ideal for detailed inspections in narrow areas.
meanings.sent3: The fiberscope attended the party, bending and twisting to fit in.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a fiberscope, absorbing knowledge from all directions.
meanings.sent5: Through the fiberscope, the world appeared interconnected and vibrant.
